YDSF dan Kartunesia Gelar Kontes Kartun Peduli Anak
02 Nov 2019, 04:43 by Anik Hasanah


YDSF dan Kartunesia Gelar Kontes Kartun Peduli Anak

KBRN, Surabaya : Anak adalah hari ini dan masa depan. Di pundaknya, harapan bangsa yang gemilang disandangkan dengan penuh cinta dan kasih sayang. Di tangan mereka pula, kelak, estafet kepemimpinan kan diserahkan bersama semangat mulia yang dicita-citakan para pendiri bangsa. Semangat ini juga yang melekat di gelaran Kontes dan Kartun Opini bertema 'Anak Indonesia : Generasi Kreatif dan Optimis', yang diadakan Yayasan Dana Sosial Al Falah (YDSF) dan Komunitas Kartun Indonesia (Kartunesia).Menurut Khoirul Anam Humas YDSF, kolaborasi ini merupakan peringatan Hari Anak Sedunia yang jatuh pada 20 November mendatang. "Momen ini tidak hanya mengingatkan kita pada sejarah penting saat PBB resmi mengadopsi Deklarasi Hak-Hak Anak pada tahun 1959 dan hasil Konvensi Hak-Hak Anak pada tahun 1989. Tapi juga momentum untuk menjaga kepedulian pada anak kita," jelas Anam, Jumat (1/11/2019).Kepedulian yang dimaksud, lanjut alumnus Sekolah Tinggi Ilmu Komunikasi - Almamater Wartawan Surabaya (Stikosa AWS) ini adalah upaya untuk lebih memperhatikan hingga menjaga, agar anak tidak terjebak dalam pengaruh buruk.Sejauh ini, kata Anam lagi, YDSF sebagai lembaga sosial pengelola zakat, infak dan sedekah, juga terus mengembangkan kegiatan yang fokus pada pengembangan kualitas anak. Di antaranya lewat beasiswa untuk anak dhuafa & yatim (Penabangsa), beasiswa Perintis dan masih banyak lagi.Terkait pelaksanaan kontes dan pameran kartun opini, Hendro D. Laksono, pendiri Komunitas Kartun Indonesia (Kartunesia) menjelaskan, kontes akan diadakan di sepanjang 28 Oktober 2019 hingga 30 November 2019."Kontes ini terbuka untuk umum. Baik hobiis, praktisi, pelajar, siapapun. Asal memiliki kartu tanda penduduk Indonesia," jelas Hendro.Setelah kontes diinfokan secara terbuka,  pada 28 Oktober hingga 23 November 2019 akan diadakan pengumpulan karya. Dijelaskan Hendro, karya peserta yang dikirim adalah file JPG dengan sisi panjang minimum 2000 pixel.Setiap peserta bisa mengirim maksimum lima karya, dikirim ke email kartunesia@gmail.com. Setiap email diberi keterangan subject 'Kontes Kartun Opini YDSF'. Dalam setiap email harus diberi keterangan nama lengkap, alamat, dan no kontak peserta."Penjurian akan dilakukan oleh pihak YDSF dan Komunitas Kartunesia pada 24 November 2019. Selanjutnya pengumuman pemenang diadakan pada 25 November 2019 di web ydsf.org, Group FB Kartun Indonesia, dan media lainnya," kata Hendro.Sebagai penghargaan untuk pemenang, juara 1 akan mendapat uang tunai Rp3 juta dan sertifikat, juara 2 Rp2 juta dan sertifikat, dan juara harapan untuk 3 pemenang masing-masing mendapat hadiah Rp750 ribu dan sertifikat.Nantinya, lanjut Hendro, 30 karya terbaik akan dipajang dalam Pameran Kartun Opini yang digelar di Gedung YDSF, Jl Kertajaya 8C/17, Surabaya, 28 hingga 30 November 2019. Dalam pameran juga diadakan kegiatan sosial di antaranya penjualan karya kartun tercetak baik dalam frame atau kaos."Semua hasil penjualan akan didonasikan pada kawan-kawan yang berhak, tentu saja lewat YDSF," pungkas Hendro.Kontak :Hendro D. YDSF and Kartunesia Hold a Child Caring Cartoon Contest
02 Nov 2019, 04:43 by Anik Hasanah


YDSF and Kartunesia Hold a Child Caring Cartoon Contest

KBRN, Surabaya: Children are today and the future. On his shoulders, the glorious hope of the nation is propped up with love and affection. In their hands too, someday, the leadership relay will be handed over with the noble spirit aspired by the nation's founders. This spirit is also inherent in the Opinion Contest and Cartoon theme entitled 'Indonesian Children: Creative and Optimistic Generation', which was held by the Al Falah Social Fund Foundation (YDSF) and the Indonesian Cartoon Community (Kartunesia). According to Khoirul Anam Humas YDSF, this collaboration is a reminder World Children's Day which falls on 20 November. "This moment not only reminds us of the important history when the United Nations officially adopted the Declaration of the Rights of the Child in 1959 and the results of the Convention on the Rights of the Child in 1989. But also the momentum to maintain concern for our children," explained Anam, Friday (1 / 11/2019). Concern is meant, continued the alumnus of the College of Communication Sciences - Almamater Journalist Surabaya (Stikosa AWS) is an effort to pay more attention to guarding, so that children are not trapped in bad influences. So far, said Anam again, YDSF as social institutions that manage zakat, donation and alms, also continue to develop activities that focus on developing the quality of children. Among them are through scholarships for orphans and orphans (Penabangsa), Pioneer scholarships and many more. Regarding the implementation of contest and exhibition of opinion cartoons, Hendro D. Laksono, founder of the Indonesian Cartoon Community (Kartunesia) explained, the contest will be held throughout October 28, 2019 until 30 November 2019. "This contest is open to the public. Good hobbyists, practitioners, students, anyone. As long as you have an Indonesian identity card," explained Hendro. After the contest was publicly informed, on October 28 to November 23 2019, a collection of works will be held. Hendro explained, the participant's work that was sent was a JPG file with a minimum length of 2000 pixels. Each participant could send a maximum of five works, sent to his email Cartoonesia@gmail.com. Each e-mail was given the subject description 'YDSF Opinion Cartoon Contest'. In each e-mail, a participant's full name, address, and contact number must be given. "The judging will be conducted by YDSF and the Cartoonesia Community on November 24, 2019. Furthermore, the announcement of the winners will be held on November 25, 2019 on the website of ydsf.org, Indonesia FB Cartoon Group and other media, "said Hendro. As an award for the winner, the first winner will get Rp3 million in cash and certificates, the second winner is Rp2 million and certificates, and the hopeful winner for 3 winners will each receive a prize of Rp750 thousand and certificates. Later, continued, Hendro, 30 of the best works will be displayed in the Opinion Cartoon Exhibition held at the YDSF Building, Jl Kertajaya 8C / 17, Surabaya, 28 to 30 November 2019. In the exhibition also held social activities including selling cartoon works printed either in frames or t-shirts. " All proceeds from the sale will be donated to friends who are entitled, of course through YDSF, "concluded Hendro. Contact: Hendro D. Laksono (08973119111) Khoirul Anam (081330677904)
